<h1>Hi, we're <span class="gradient_text">geo:truth</span>.</h1>
<p>A non-profit research organization focused on uncovering health disparities and global challenges using geography.</p>




<p> We are on a <span style="color:#00A9A3">mission</span> to use geography and data to uncover health disparities and drive positive change globally.</p>

<p>We <span style="color:#00A9A3">envision</span> a world where everyone has equal access to health and well-being regardless of zipcode.</p>

<p>We <span style="color:#00A9A3">value</span> <b>equity</b>, <b>innovation</b>, <b>collaboration</b>, <b>transparency</b>, <b>empowerment</b>. </p>

<p>We <span style="color:#00A9A3">believe</span> that the <span style='text-decoration: underline;text-decoration-color: #00A9A3;'>truth is worth discovering.</span></p>

</br></br></br></br></br></br>
<span class="gradient_text"><h1>What We Do</h1></span>
<h2>Geospatial Analysis + Epidemiological Research</h2> 

<p>Utilizing mapping and spatial analysis techniques to identify health disparities and high-risk areas, informing targeted interventions.</p>
<p>Conducting rigorous epidemiological studies to uncover the root causes of health inequities and develop evidence-based strategies for prevention and intervention.</p>


<h2>Capacity Building</h2> 
<p>Providing training and technical assistance to <span style="color:#00A9A3;">give power back</span> to local organizations and healthcare providers with the tools and knowledge to address health disparities in their communities.</p>

<h2>Advocacy and Policy</h2> 
<p>Advocating for policies and initiatives that promote health equity and ensure that vulnerable populations have access to the resources and support they need to thrive.</p>

</br></br></br></br></br></br>
<b><h1><span style="color:#00A9A3">Get Involved</h1></span></b>
<p>Join the <b><span style="color:#00A9A3">geo:truth</span></b> community (or 'tribe' as we say) in our mission to build a healthier, more equitable world!</p>
<p>Whether you're a researcher, practitioner, advocate, or concerned citizen, there are many ways to get involved with geo:truth. Together, we can make a difference and create lasting change for generations to come.</p>

<p>Subscribe here to get updates about our work:</p>
